DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate psychometric property newly develop Fear Activity Situations - Heart Failure ( FActS-HF 15 ) scale . The FActS-HF 15 questionnaire assess fear physical activity ( fear movement ) patient chronic heart failure . FActS-HF 15 ass cognition emotion occur physical activity , independent avoidance behavior . Firstly , study aim evaluate instrument 's reliability validity investigate association fear physical activity demographic , medical , psychosocial patient characteristic . Secondly , study aim assess everyday physical activity use accelerometric measure test hypothesis fear physical activity patient heart failure relate low actual physical activity .
